name: pasta
description: Pasta is a simple self-hosted pastebin service for storing text snippets. It supports themes, expiration, and syntax highlighting with a minimal web interface.
features: Text snippet storage: Store and share code snippets, logs, or text content with unique URLs for easy reference
Syntax highlighting: Automatic code highlighting for multiple programming languages improves readability and code review
Expiration options: Set pastes to expire after specified time period or number of views for temporary sharing
Theme support: Choose from multiple color themes including light and dark modes for comfortable viewing
Private pastes: Create unlisted pastes that are only accessible via direct link, not shown in public listings
Raw text view: Access paste content as plain text for easy copying, downloading, or integration with command-line tools
No registration: Create and share pastes immediately without account creation for quick, anonymous sharing
Minimal interface: Clean, distraction-free UI focuses on content with simple navigation and fast loading times
